EMPTY_FIELD_ERROR: Please provide input for all fields.
USER_DOES_NOT_EXIST_ERROR: The username and password provided does not match any LobangKing accounts. Please try again.
INVALID_CREDENTIALS_ERROR: Invalid login credentials. Register a new account or try again.
INVALID_FIELDS_ERROR: There are some issues with the details provided.
INSUFFICIENT_COINS_ERROR: You need a minimum of 10 coins to boost!
MAX_TAGS_REACHED_ERROR: Lobangs can only have a maximum of 3 tags!
LOBANG_NAME_MIN_LENGTH_ERROR: Lobang name needs to be at least 5 characters long!
LOBANG_MIN_ORDER_INVALID_ERROR: You have not specified a minimum order quantity!
LOBANG_DESCRIPTION_MIN_LENGTH_ERROR: Lobang description needs to be at least 10 characters long!
LOBANG_LOCATION_NOT_SET_ERROR: You have not specified a location!
LOBANG_DATE_NOT_SET_ERROR: There are some issues with the dates provided.
LOBANG_NO_PRODUCTS_ERROR: A lobang must have at least one product!
PRODUCT_NAME_MIN_LENGTH_ERROR: Product name needs to be at least 5 characters long!
PRODUCT_NO_PRICE_ERROR: You have not specified a price for this product!
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION_MIN_LENGTH_ERROR: Product description needs to be at least 10 characters long!
PRODUCT_MAX_QTY_NOT_SET_ERROR: You have not specified the max quantity of products!
